statements: UPDATE work_in_progress_inventory SET quantity = 20 WHERE production_id = 1234;
UPDATE work_in_progress_inventory SET worker_id = 4567, work_station = 'Painting' WHERE production_id = 5678;
UPDATE work_in_progress_inventory SET quantity = 20, end_time = '2022-06-30 12:00:00' WHERE production_id = 101 AND worker_id = 567
UPDATE work_in_progress_inventory SET start_time = '2022-07-01 08:00:00', work_station = 'Assembly Line 3' WHERE production_id = 202
UPDATE work_in_progress_inventory SET quantity = 50, production_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE production_flow SET worker_name = 'John Doe', start_time = '2022-09-15 08:00:00' WHERE id = 201;
UPDATE work_in_progress_inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10, status = 'In Progress' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE production_flow SET end_time = '2022-12-31 23:59:59', worker_name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE work_in_progress_inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE id = 1001;
UPDATE production_flow_monitor SET status = 'Completed', last_updated = NOW() WHERE product_name = 'Product XYZ';
UPDATE work_in_progress_inventory SET quantity = 100, in_production = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE production_flow_monitor SET status = 'Completed', last_updated = '2022-02-28 10:30:00' WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE Workstations SET workstation_location = 'New Location' WHERE workstation_id = 1;
UPDATE AssemblyLine SET line_leader = 'John Doe', workstation_id = 2 WHERE assembly_line_id = 3;
UPDATE Workstations SET workstation_name = 'New Name', workstation_location = 'New Location' WHERE workstation_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET unit_price = 15.99, product_category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE work_orders SET order_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE order_id = 101
UPDATE products SET unit_price = 25.99, product_name = 'Updated Product' WHERE product_id = 201
UPDATE work_orders SET order_date = '2022-01-15', quantity = 100 WHERE order_id = 101
UPDATE products SET unit_price = 25.50, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE product_id = 201
